title: Sri Lanka declares curfew after violent pro-gvt protest
body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka has imposed a curfew in several parts of Colombo on May (09) after a pro-government in front of the Prime Minister Mahinda Rajapaksa’s resident Temple Trees turned violent against the peaceful anti-government protesters.
According to reports Colombo North, Central and South are under curfew with immediate effect.
